manga.title: [Non-KFC] Charlotte
manga.description: Follow Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in their search for the ultimate treasure, the One Piece.
manga.author: Eiichiro Oda
manga.noted: This is a fan-made manga based on the original work.

manga.title: [Non-KFC] Rewrite Side-R (ch 4-6)
manga.description: A side story of the visual novel Rewrite, focusing on the characters and events that occur in the Side-R route.
manga.author: Key
manga.noted: This is a fan-made manga based on the original work.
